(App) is freeware application with open source code, developed by Eyesless.dev (you could see the App code on our GitHub account). This app is in beta-test phase and distributed “as-is” without any commitment from the developer to user or third part. The only way we distribute this App - Google Play, please DO NOT install this app from any another source.
